description:
Any additional props such as event listeners will be applied
to the chip itself, not the chip container.

style.description: Any style that should be added to the chip container.

className.description: An optional className to add to the chip container.

label.description: The label to display in the chip.

onClick.description: An optional function to call when the chip is clicked.

remove.description:
An optional function to call to convert the chip into a removable chip.
This will inject a remove icon button into the chip.

removeIconChildren.description: The children to use to display the remove icon button.

removeIconClassName.description: The icon className to use to display the remove icon button.

onFocus.description: An optional function to call when the chip is focused.

onBlur.description: An optional function to call when the chip is blurred.

children.description:
This should be an Avatar component that will be injected before the
label in the chip.
